male_trainers.name: Salman Ahmad
male_trainers.bio: Senior trainer with extensive experience in strength training, bodybuilding, and fitness transformation. Specializes in helping clients achieve their fitness goals through personalized training programs.
male_trainers.education: BS Sports Science, Certified Personal Trainer

male_trainers.name: Ammar Asif
male_trainers.bio: Senior trainer focused on holistic fitness approach combining strength training, cardio, and nutrition. Expert in weight loss, muscle building, and lifestyle transformation.

male_trainers.name: Hassan Ali
male_trainers.bio: Professional MMA instructor with extensive combat sports background. Trained in multiple disciplines and has competed internationally.
male_trainers.education: Black Belt BJJ, Muay Thai Certification

female_trainers.name: Sarah Khan
female_trainers.bio: Certified yoga instructor focused on mindfulness and holistic wellness. Specializes in stress relief, flexibility, and mental well-being through guided sessions.

female_trainers.name: Fatima Sheikh
female_trainers.bio: Expert nutrition coach providing personalized meal plans and dietary guidance. Helps clients optimize their fitness results through proper nutrition and lifestyle changes.

female_trainers.name: Ayesha Malik
female_trainers.bio: Energetic group fitness instructor specializing in high-intensity workouts and dance fitness. Creates fun and effective group training sessions.

programs.title: Strength & Body Building
programs.description: Build lean muscle mass and increase your strength with our comprehensive bodybuilding program designed for all levels.

programs.title: Cardio and Strength
programs.description: Combine cardiovascular fitness with strength training for a complete body transformation and improved endurance.

programs.title: Mixed Martial Arts
programs.description: Learn MMA techniques including striking, grappling, and self-defense with our professional martial arts training.

programs.title: Diet and Nutrition
programs.description: Expert nutritional guidance and meal planning to optimize your fitness results and achieve your health goals.

programs.title: Crossfit
programs.description: High-intensity functional fitness training that combines weightlifting, cardio, and gymnastics for maximum results.

programs.title: Training Services
programs.description: One-on-one personal training with certified trainers for personalized fitness goals and maximum results.
